contents:
事实上，PRISM-Break既没有推荐ProtonMail，也没有推荐Tutanota，
你所说的多方查證、獨立思考云云，却引用了Tutanota官方的说法，则显得莫名其妙

相关的资讯网上随便一搜即可获得
例如 The Ultimate Guide to Online Privacy (Updated: August 5th, 2019)
提到 we do recommend most to switch your email provider to one like Protonmail.
另外还有ThinkPrivacy，对于Email，EDITOR'S CHOICE显然是Protonmail

就在你提到的ProPrivacy，
Douglas Crawford 撰写的 Secure Privacy Email Options 2019 中
(Last Updated:July 29, 2019)
ProtonMail也位列榜首，

事实上，他在其他文章中也提到
The fact that Tutanota is open source while ProtonMail is not should, in theory, give it an edge,
but Tutanota’s source code has not been independently audited by reputable researchers.
而对于ProtonMail，其源代码有着专业严格的审查
Unlike much open source code, however,
ProtonMail’s has been extensively audited by a team of well-known and respected cryptographers who volunteered (for no payment) to oversee the project, looking for backdoors and other nastinesses.

其他的如The definitive guide to email encryption (Dennis Anon. May 22, 2019)、
AlternativeTo、德国的Erfahrungen.com等等，都可以作为参考

总之，ProtonMail和Tutanota都是很好的E2E邮件服务，
只是个人目前倾向于PM
